>>37733369

You choose to "ask about an item", but the NPC simply tilts her head inquisitively when you present the weapons.

"Can you identify these?" You ask.

"I don't think so."

"Do you know who can?"

She pauses, as if computing a response, then points in a direction. "Go see the fortune teller, in the tent down the street."

You follow the stone road to a purple tent, hastily set up on wooden poles. Inside is full of fog, thick with an intoxicating scent. The place is empty, save for a table with a crystal ball on a pillow in the center. An NPC sits behind it, features obscured by a large hooded robe; a pair of glowing feline eyes stares at you from under the hood as you enter.

"Do you wish to know what lies beneath the beneath?" They ask.
